import{FETCH_ALL,CREATE,UPDATE,DELETE,LIKE}from'../constants/actionTypes';// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default(function(){var posts=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case DELETE:return posts.filter(function(post){return post._id!==action.payload;});case UPDATE:case LIKE:return posts.map(function(post){return post._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:post;});case FETCH_ALL:return action.payload;// eslint-disable-next-line no-duplicate-case
